_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Incredible and amazing qualities of a Re: The Realized One is able to know the Buddhas of the past who have become completely extinguished
The Realized One knows the caste they were born in, and also their names, clans, conduct, teaching, wisdom, meditation, and freedom
The Realized One knows feelings as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
The Realized One knows perceptions as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
The Realized One knows thoughts as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
Incredible qualities of the Buddha [mn12: The Buddha was reborn in the host of Joyful Gods
The Buddha remained in the host of Joyful Gods
The Buddha remained in the host of Joyful Gods for the whole of that life
The Buddha passed away from the host of Joyful Gods and was conceived in his mother’s womb
An immeasurable, magnificent light appears when the being intent on awakening passes away from the host of Joyful Gods
Four deities approach to guard the four directions when the being intent on awakening is conceived in his mother’s belly
The mother of the being intent on awakening becomes naturally ethical when he is conceived in her belly
The mother of the being intent on awakening no longer feels sexual desire for men when he is conceived in her belly
The mother of the being intent on awakening obtains the five kinds of sensual stimulation and amuses herself when he is conceived in her belly
No afflictions beset the mother of the being intent on awakening when he is conceived in her belly
Seven days after the being intent on awakening is born, his mother passes away and is reborn in the host of Joyful Gods
The mother of the being intent on awakening gives birth after exactly ten months
The mother of the being intent on awakening only gives birth standing up
When the being intent on awakening emerges from his mother’s womb, gods receive him first, then humans
When the being intent on awakening emerges from his mother’s womb, he emerges already clean, unsoiled by waters, mucus, blood, or any other kind of impurity, pure and clean
Two streams of water appear in the sky, one cool, one warm, for bathing the being intent on awakening and his mother when he is born
The being intent on awakening stands firm with his own feet on the ground as soon as he’s born
The being intent on awakening takes seven strides with a white parasol held above him, surveys all quarters, and makes a dramatic proclamation when he is born
An immeasurable, magnificent light appears when the being intent on awakening emerges from his mother’s womb.
